segments.text: I see the woman in her knee-length dress, so engrossed in cleaning.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost endearing how dedicated she is to her chores.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I look at the floor, and my heart sinks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is pooling dangerously, and she’s oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on the stool is reaching way too high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a rush of anxiety as I see the wobble of the stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the girl standing there, waiting for her cookie, looks completely naive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a recipe for disaster in this cozy little space.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but wish they would notice the chaos just behind them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This juxtaposition of calm and chaos is striking but troubling.
segments.speaker: PAR
